title: Tell Me What You Want (In Bed) with Dr. Justin Lehmiller
itunes:title: Tell Me What You Want (In Bed) with Dr. Justin Lehmiller
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily is joined by Dr. Justin Lehmiller – a leading expert on human sexuality – to talk about his book, Tell Me What You Want: The Science of Sexual Desire and How it Can Help You Improve Your Sex Life. They discuss sexual...
description:
On today’s show, Emily is joined by Dr. Justin Lehmiller – a leading expert on human sexuality – to talk about his book, Tell Me What You Want: The Science of Sexual Desire and How it Can Help You Improve Your Sex Life.

They discuss sexual fantasies, what they mean, and why it’s totally okay to have them (psst, we all do). Plus, they get into the benefits of sharing your fantasies with your partner, what the top ones are around the U.S., and the difference between men and women – and the similarities, too.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: Hot Octopuss, Womanizer, Fleshlight, Adam & Eve

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

Follow Dr. Lehmiller on Instagram: @justinjlehmiller

For more of Dr. Lehmiller, visit: sexandpsychology.com

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit: sexwithemily.com

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
